item.title: Sink Tap for Kitchen BL-9876 Flexible
item.dc:creator: Mukesh
item.description:
10X Sink Tap for Kitchen BL-9876 Flexible Neck Dual Flow Black Color 2 Function Shower Flow/Foam Flow Wall Mount, Chrome Finish

The post Sink Tap for Kitchen BL-9876 Flexible appeared first on Om Electrical.
item.content:encoded:
About this item

  • Metal Creations from Honey Brass Metal . The Spout is silicone
  • Durable Factory Tested Ceramic Cartridge, survive 500,000 times open & close test.
  • Installation Size: 1/2 inch BSP
  • If Leakage comes after rough usage of the tap , Change the O rings of the Flexible Spout Supplied with tap.
  • You can rotate it in any direction, you can straighten up, but there will be no scar marks on it, nothing will come, long-lasting high quality silicone

The post Sink Tap for Kitchen BL-9876 Flexible appeared first on Om Electrical.

item.title: Havells Instanio 3-L
item.dc:creator: Mukesh
item.description:
Havells Instanio 3-Litre Instant Geyser (White/Blue), Wall Mount

The post Havells Instanio 3-L appeared first on Om Electrical.
item.content:encoded:
About this item

  • LED Indicator: Colour-changing LEDs that change from blue to amber to indicate the hotness of the water
  • Outer Body: Rust and shock proof ABS outer body for long life
  • Inner Tank: Stainless steel inner tank of 304 grade
  • Power Cord: Fire retardant power cord for maximum safety
  • 0.65 MPa Bar Pressure: Suitable for high rise buildings and pressure pump applications
  • ISI Marked and ISI certification
  • Capacity: 3 liters, Heating element: Copper Heating element

The post Havells Instanio 3-L appeared first on Om Electrical.

item.title: Crompton Gracee 5-L
item.dc:creator: Mukesh
item.description:
Crompton Gracee 5-L Instant Water Heater (Geyser), Wall Mounting

The post Crompton Gracee 5-L appeared first on Om Electrical.
item.content:encoded:
About this item

  • PRODUCT: Crompton’s 5L instant water heater with fast heating function
  • TECHNICAL SPECIFICATIONS: Wattage: 3000W; Capacity: 5L; Pressure 6.5 bar
  • WARRANTY: 5 year warranty on Tank, 2 year warranty on Element and 2 year warranty on Product provided by Crompton from date of purchase
  • 4 LEVEL SAFETY: Steam Thermostat, automatic thermal cut-out, pressure release valve and a fusible plug to ensure complete safety.
  • ANTI-RUST: Rust free PP body along with a weldless tank design that enhances resistance to corrosion and ensures long life

The post Crompton Gracee 5-L appeared first on Om Electrical.

item.title: PHILIPS Stellar Bright 40-watt LED T-Bulb
item.dc:creator: Mukesh
item.description:
PHILIPS Stellar Bright 40-watt LED T-Bulb , Base B22

The post PHILIPS Stellar Bright 40-watt LED T-Bulb appeared first on Om Electrical.
item.content:encoded:
About this item

  • Specifications: Philips T bulb is a powerful 40 Watt LED Bulb with a B22 base cap, compatible with your existing bulb holders
  • Wider light spread: The new Philips T bulb with its futuristic design resembling a tube light, has a brighter and wider light spread, This Philips T-Bulb delivers flicker-free light
  • Swivelling body action: The Philips T bulb has a flexible swivelling body action in which its head can move both 90 degrees vertically and 35 degrees horizontally for better focus
  • Plug n play: No need for an electrician. With this plug n play bulb, fitting the Philips T bulb will be a hassle free process

The post PHILIPS Stellar Bright 40-watt LED T-Bulb appeared first on Om Electrical.
